author: kerstinlovisa
body: #### PR description: This PR includes producers and setup for a first version of EXO PAG customizations of nanoAOD, with customization combined from multiple analysis teams working with long-lived particles, including: - Displaced muons - Displaced electrons - Displaced jets (with leptons) - Muon detector showers - Displaced taus (not yet included but will be included very soon as well) Previously discussed at the [nanoAOD deep dive](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1434848/#27-exo-and-nanoaod-20-10), within XPOG [April 2 2025](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1528271/#7-exonanoaod) and [July 9 2025](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1562550/#5-exonano-status-report), and within EXO at the [EXO workshop](https://indi.to/JMj42) and [general meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1507274/#2-exo-emfxpog-towards-exonanoa). #### PR validation: Collections with number of variables and sizes for different datasets has been evaluated: Timing study done for running AOD -> EXOnanoAODv1 in one step tested on one file from TTto4Q MC dataset, accounting for differences on different machines. The study shows the relative time difference between producing standard nanoAOD and EXOnanoAODv1 as a function of number of events, with less than a factor 2 relative time increase. The test script [PhysicsTools/NanoAOD/test/test-exoNano.sh](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...kerstinlovisa:cmssw:EXOnanoAODv1?expand=1#diff-f2d8ac85795f844aa07693a5ddcc07f598e009dbc80f6c9f6ec18496c7911f7c) runs CMS driver command for AOD->EXOnanoAODv1 in one step (with --step PAT,NANO:(at)EXO) and works for this setup. @kakwok @enibigir @jniedzie
title: EXOnanoAODv1 producers and setup
